item.title: Bitcoin.com Bus Shunned by Las Vegas Bitcoiners Over Politics
item.description:
Bitcoin.com Bus Shunned by Las Vegas Bitcoiners Over Politics

The Bleish family's "Dash Across America Tour" in the Bitcoin.com bus was derailed yesterday when, during their Las Vegas stop, the organizer of the city's Bitcoin meetup denied them access because of the family's support for Dash. Also read: Blockchain Lead Vacates Position at UBS, Joins BNY Mellon on Steemit.

item.title: Airbus joined Hyperledger Blockchain Project | HolyTransaction
item.description:
Airbus joined Hyperledger Blockchain Project | HolyTransaction

French airplane firm Airbus joined Hyperledger Blockchain Project, or the Linux Foundation blockchain-related program. Last year Airbus sold more than 1,000 aircraft and now the company is joining the same blockchain project that also sees the participation of firms such as IBM, Red Hat, Intel and JPMorgan.

item.title: After $65 million hack, questions of whether Bitcoin can be safe
item.description:
After $65 million hack, questions of whether Bitcoin can be safe

It seemed bitcoin exchange Bitfinex was doing all the right things. In the end, that didn't stop hackers from stealing $65 million. The latest in a long list of attacks on the digital currency since its birth in 2009 has been particularly vexing for the bitcoin community.

item.title: Bitcoin Usage Fuels Ransomware Attacks | PYMNTS.com
item.description:
Bitcoin Usage Fuels Ransomware Attacks | PYMNTS.com

As the instances and threat of ransomware continues to wreak havoc on both businesses, governments and individuals around the world, it seems as though bitcoin has found itself closely intertwined with the malicious software. As The Wall Street Journal pointed out on Friday (Aug.

item.title: Amazon-Rival Rakuten Forms Blockchain Lab
item.description:
Amazon-Rival Rakuten Forms Blockchain Lab

Amazon competitor Rakuten is launching the Rakuten Blockchain Lab (RBL) in Belfast, UK, to explore potential applications for blockchain technology in fintech and e-commerce. Also read: Blockchain Lead Vacates Position at UBS, Joins BNY Mellon The establishment of RBL stems from Rakuten's earlier investment in Bitcoin wallet and payments software firm Bitnet, a startup notable for its founding by former Visa executives.

item.title: 'Bitcoin Unlimited' Reveals $500K Donation, Formal US Registration
item.description:
'Bitcoin Unlimited' Reveals $500K Donation, Formal US Registration

Bitcoin Unlimited has announced major changes to its status including formal registration as a non-profit following a $500,000 donation. Also read: Bitcoin 'Whales' Vote in Favor of Larger Tx Blocks The news was released to members via a post today, and comes as the community at large appears to be shifting to a larger blocksize consensus.

item.title: Corrupt Silk Road Investigator Shaun Bridges Is Grasping At Straws
item.description:
Corrupt Silk Road Investigator Shaun Bridges Is Grasping At Straws

The situation is not looking all that bright for Shaun Bridges, the corrupt government official who helped bring down Silk Road. While he has filed a new appeal not too long ago, even his own lawyer is not giving the attempt much chance of success.

item.title: How to Run Bitcoin as a Tor Hidden Service on Ubuntu
item.description:
How to Run Bitcoin as a Tor Hidden Service on Ubuntu

Why should you run a Bitcoin hidden service on your node?* It increases the privacy of other Bitcoin users who are anonymizing their actions via Tor.

item.title: Ripple Labs CTO Warns of Blockchain Dystopia
item.description:
Ripple Labs CTO Warns of Blockchain Dystopia

Longtime blockchain developer and enthusiast has warned blockchains could bring about a dystopia in new essay. Stefan Thomas, Chief Technology Officer at Ripple Labs, a leading private and public ledger company, wrote an essay titled " The Subtle Tyranny of Blockchain ."

item.title: Deutsche Bank Researchers Deem A Stock Market Collapse Necessary To Boost Economy
item.description:
Deutsche Bank Researchers Deem A Stock Market Collapse Necessary To Boost Economy

Fixing the global economy is a massive task, and no one seems to have a solution for this problem. Deutsche Bank's fixed-income research team feels the only solution is to collapse the stock market in its entirety. A rather bold statement, but the average Bitcoin user will not be surprised by this declaration.
